Title: Pearl Drop Set Sterling Silver Necklace Earrings Jewerly Elegant Women Fashion
Description: Pearl Drop Set Sterling Silver Necklace Earrings Jewerly Elegant Women Fashion Description: Pearl Drop Set Sterling Silver Necklace Earrings Jewerly Elegant Women Fashion Outer Dimensions Approx: 39.5 x 28.3 x 64.5 cm (L x W x H)Made from Steel with Premium Glossy FinishGlossy red steel push-lid recycling bin with a total capacity of 38LMake recycling quick and easy with the removable internal compartment--> This elegant accessory set combines a plum shaped cultured pearl held by an argent sterling silver mount. Product Features: Condition: New Colors: White Style: Dressy, oval, daily, fashion Material: Solid sterling silver Stone: Cultured freshwater pearl Pearl size: 7.0 mm Pearl grade: B Weight: 2.10 grams Pendant dimensions approx: 7.0 mm (0.280 inch) wide x 20.0 mm (0.790 inch) long (including bail) Bail opening measurement: 2.0 mm Length: 18.0 inches long, 0.750 mm thick Chain type: Cable Clasp: Spring ring Earring dimensions approx: 7.0 mm (0.280 inch) wide x 22.0 mm (0.870 inch) long Earring weight: 2.60 grams Earring type: Pierced post drop Closure: Push back Meant to simulate the silhouette of a dew drop, this set includes a pair of the dew drop pierced post earrings along with a cable chain necklace featuring the signature pendant.
